name: Jackpot Dungeon
description:
Welcome to the Jackpot Dungeon, hope your ready to gamble but not with money WITH YOUR LIVES MUAHAHA!

Jackpot Dungeon is a 4 player couch co-op game where you and up to 3 friends are able to choose between 4 jobs to take on the dungeon. If you succeed riches will be yours and all the glory in the world!

-Controls-

Requires a controller for each player.

Left thumbstick - Movement

D-Pad - Menu (Left and Right to change jobs | Up and Down to change colours)

R2 / RT - Attack

L2 / LT - Special Attack

L1 + R1 / LB + RB - Ultimate

-History-

This project was developed for a student assessment, I'm uploading it for access for my portfolio. Shout outs to Team 777 <3
